reviewText: If you're reading this then you know who Rich Little is, so i will skip the proliminaries. Sometimes astonishingly accurate and other times embarassingly miscalculated in his voice work and mannerisms, Little was responsible for the writing of the material here also. That said, it's entertaining family entertainment for those who do not discriminate-and it is pretty darn funny at times. Unrated, but a hard PG for profanity.
